    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractRegistryController

        public AbstractRegistryController(Class<? extends org.openbase.jul.extension.rsb.scope.jp.JPScope> jpScopePropery,
                                  MB builder)
                           throws org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException
        Constructor creates a new RegistryController based on the given scope and publishing registry data of the given builder. Node: By default this constructor filters sparsely registry data. If you want to publish data of internal registries even if other internal registries are not ready yet, use can use the other constructor of this class and set the filterSparselyRegistryData flag to false.
        Parameters:
        jpScopePropery - the scope which is used for registry communication and data publishing.
        builder - the builder to build the registry data message.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException

      • AbstractRegistryController

        public AbstractRegistryController(Class<? extends org.openbase.jul.extension.rsb.scope.jp.JPScope> jpScopePropery,
                                  MB builder,
                                  boolean filterSparselyRegistryData)
                           throws org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException
        Constructor creates a new RegistryController based on the given scope and publishing registry data of the given builder.
        Parameters:
        jpScopePropery - the scope which is used for registry communication and data publishing.
        builder - the builder to build the registry data message.
        filterSparselyRegistryData - if this flag is true the registry data is only published if non of the internal registries is busy.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.InstantiationException
